trans-unit.source: A class that serializes <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />-derived classes to and from Atom 1.0 format.
trans-unit.target: Una classe per la serializzazione di classi derivate da <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> da e verso il formato Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived classes and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> derived classes from XML documents that contain Atom 1.0 feeds.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa classe per serializzare istanze di classi derivate da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>e creare istanze di classi derivate da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> da documenti XML che contengono feed in formato Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: If you must serialize a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter> formatter instead.
trans-unit.target: Se Ã¨ necessario serializzare un'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>, utilizzare invece il formattatore <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter>.

trans-unit.source: The Atom 1.0 specification allows for fractional seconds to be specified in any of its date constructs.
trans-unit.target: La specifica Atom 1.0 consente di specificare secondi frazionari in uno qualsiasi dei costrutti data.

trans-unit.source: When serializing and deserializing, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] implementation ignores the fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: I secondi frazionari verranno ignorati dall'implementazione di [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] durante la fase di serializzazione e deserializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived class and serialize it to Atom 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice seguente viene illustrato come creare una classe derivata da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>ed eseguirne la serializzazione per Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived class and serialize it to Atom 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice seguente viene illustrato come creare una classe derivata da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>ed eseguirne la serializzazione per Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />-derived instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter`1" /> con l'istanza derivata della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived class and serialize it to Atom 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice seguente viene illustrato come creare una classe derivata da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>ed eseguirne la serializzazione per Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe derivata da <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> class.
